fields.title: Egypt Wins African Cup
fields.content: Egypt’s national football team claimed victory in the African Cup final after a tense penalty shootout.

fields.title: Presidential Debate Heats Up
fields.content: Candidates exchanged sharp words in the final debate before elections, highlighting major policy differences

fields.title: AI Breakthrough in Medical Diagnosis
fields.content: A new AI model can detect over 30 diseases with higher accuracy than traditional diagnostic methods.

fields.title: Cairo Hosts International Art Fair
fields.content: Artists from over 40 countries are exhibiting their work in this year’s Cairo Art Week.

fields.title: Breaking News: Cabinet Reshuffle Announced
fields.content:
The Prime Minister announced a cabinet reshuffle affecting several key ministries.
Category: News

fields.title: Local Team Advances to Final
fields.content: Alexandria FC secured a place in the national league final after a thrilling 3–2 win.

fields.title: Parliament Approves New Tax Law
fields.content: The new law is expected to streamline business taxes and increase government revenue.

fields.title: Google Unveils New Search AI
fields.content: The new algorithm improves contextual understanding and is expected to launch globally by next month.

fields.title: Record Rainfall in Upper Egypt
fields.content: Torrential rains caused flooding in several towns, prompting emergency response efforts.

fields.title: Modern Arabic Calligraphy Exhibit Opens
fields.content: The exhibit showcases how modern artists are reinventing Arabic calligraphy for the digital age.
